hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Market## has #12# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #6# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Prescription#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Cojiro#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Near Boss

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Raised Island Courtyard

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Happy Mask Shop#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Compass# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
